 What can you do now?
 You’ve now lost your value as a “vessel.”
 A new vessel is heading this way.
 Well…
 At this point in time, it’s too late, but…
 Okay! You said you were going to let one person out of here.
 You’re going to keep your promise.
 What’re you doing? Open the door now!
 What? There was another one?
 Hurry up and…
 No…I… I’ll be eaten here, right now…
 I’ll let you out of here…
 And I shall grant you just one wish.
 My clan that was captured for your experiments.
 Please release them.
 Sure. Consider it done.
 You don’t have to worry.
 Your strong will is going to remain as Residual Aura inside me.
 It’s not like you’ll lose everything.
 Now then, your flesh is mine…
 With this, Lord Orochimaru’s body will, once again
 be unable to reanimate for several years.
 However, there is the next time.
 I-Indeed…
 my body no longer has value as a vessel for Reanimation Jutsu.
 It will now be difficult for me who has lost everything…
 to find my own calling.
 I’ve finally understood that…
 Even if it’s not me,
 I’ll bring in the new “vessel” even if it costs me my life.
 That’s my repayment to Lord Orochimaru…
 That’s the only redemption for me for being worthless…
 Hold on a minute!
 Are we almost there?
 No… It should still take a while.
 More importantly…
 What were those idiots Jirobo and Kidomaru doing?!
 We caught up!
 All right! I’ll take care of this nice and quick!
 R-Right away?!
 Eat this!
 Multiple Fists Barrage!
 Chakra in his palm…?!
 Shadow Clone Transformation, eh?
 Rasengan!
 N-No way… His hands now…?!
 There’s no point if I catch you before you do it!
 Now, Kiba!
 Tunneling Fang!
 This was also a Shadow Clone?!
 Luring Sakon into alignment with me…
 and aiming at me from the start?!
 You think you succeeded just with that?!
 Damn!
 I’ve been nailed.
 Shadow Possession Jutsu succeeded!
 A diversion…
 He’s coming!
 Tayuya! What’re you doing idling away?!
 N-No!
 Why do you move forward?!
 I can’t dodge!
 Here you go!
 Nice! Kiba, Shikamaru!
 Shikamaru! Let’s get out of here!
 Yeah!
 Punks…!
 You scums… Messing around with us.
 They were full of openings just as I thought.
 Having too much ability individually is also a problem…
 It went well.
 Yeah, it went just as calculated!
 Just in terms of teamwork, ours was way better than theirs.
 I won’t let you get away!
 For the first time, I spoke to you
 And you smiled
 For the first time, I was able to speak
 In my own words
 Would you think it was a bother if I approached you?
 Despite my doubts, I worked up my courage

 I feel so sad
 But…

 For the first time, I was able to speak
 In my own words
 For the first time, I spoke to you
 And you smiled
 For the first time, I was able to speak
 In my own words
 For the first time, I spoke to you
 Damn it! To come this far and have another one appear!
 On top of that, there’s something out of ordinary about this guy.
 What’s this bloodcurdling feeling on my back?
 Indeed, we are even on numbers, two against two.
 But this…
 I’m sorry, Naruto. He’s my miscalculation.

 Since not one person in my squad would do something like

 Being the cloud-loving loafer myself,

 Listen. I’m not thinking anything like they were sacrifices.
 I’m not thinking anything like they’ve died.
 Don’t mock my comrades.
 I got you.
 Summoning Jutsu!
 This doesn’t…look so good.

 What does Father really think of Big Brother and me?
 What is it all of a sudden?
 The other day, Father said to me, “That’s my boy.”
 He’d always said that only to Big Brother.
 So I was really happy.
 I see…Good for you.
 But lately, Father and Brother haven’t been getting along, so…
 I was thinking…
 that I might just be a replacement for Big Brother.
 Your older brother’s your older brother. And you are you.
 Your father cares deeply about you both.
 Then why does he only think about Big Brother?!
 That’s not it…
 Your father has to protect the Uchiha Clan
 as a representative of the clan.
 What about it?!
 Itachi is just bigger than you and is your elder.
 He’ll naturally be entrusted
 with that much more work for the clan, right?
 Your father is the supervisor of the work, so…
 it might be that his eyes were likely to go towards your older brother.
 But, this is just between us.
 When he’s with me,
 your father does nothing but talk about you.
 He’s just always sullen and awkward, so…
 I’ll catch up to Big Brother no matter what!
 Damn it…!
 Big Brother’s back is still far out of reach.
 Forgive me, Sasuke… Maybe another time.
 Clan…Clan…
 You measure incorrectly the size of your own “vessels”
 and don’t know the depth of mine, so you grovel there.
 My “vessel” is dismayed at this foolish clan.
 I feel like…ever since that day,
 he hasn’t been the same as he was before.
 Big Brother…
 Today, when school’s finished,
 will you join me for some Shuriken Jutsu training?
 I’m busy. You should have Father teach you.
 But even I know that you’re better at Shuriken Jutsu than Father is.
 You always treat me like a nuisance like that.
 Forgive me, Sasuke. Maybe next time…
 I don’t have the time to be dealing with you today.
 You always say, “Forgive me, Sasuke,” and poke me on the forehead.
 and you say “today,” but it never happens.
 Thank goodness… he’s the same as before.
 Big Brother…
 His eyes looking back at Father that time…
 It wasn’t just an ordinary Sharingan…
 And…
 Father…?
 Hmm?
 Are there several types of Sharingan?
 Oh…You’re already interested in Sharingan?
 However, it's still too soon for you.
 It’s totally different from the Fire Style Jutsu.
 But someday, I too…!
 After all… I’m your kid, so.
 Indeed, there is a Visual Jutsu above the Sharingan,
 the Mangekyo Sharingan.
 Mangekyo Sharingan…
 In the long history of the Uchiha,
 it’s a legendary Visual Jutsu that only a few develop.
 And it’s said that it only opened under a particular condition.
 A particular condition…?
 Don’t chase after your older brother anymore.
 I wonder what he thinks of my relationship with Brother?
 Father…
 Why doesn’t Big Brother care about me?
 He’s a bit peculiar…
 He’s a type of person who doesn’t care for making friends with people.
 Why?
 Who knows…?
 Even I, his father, can’t read that boy.
 Here I spoke because I wanted more of Big Brother’s attention.
 Father isn’t against it.
 Here, Sasuke! Your box lunch.
 I’ll watch your Shuriken practice after you come home.
 It’s not practice, it’s training!
 I’m off!
 That’s good…
 It’s not that Father dislikes Big Brother, after all.
 Big Brother graduated from the Academy at the top of his class at age seven.
 He learned to use the Sharingan at age eight.
 And he was promoted to Chunin at age ten.
 But, I’ve got the same Uchiha blood flowing inside me as he does.
 I won’t lose to him!
 You’re not gonna tell me this is the best you can do, are you?
 You boast about your Way of Ninja and this is all you've got?
 Are you still thinking that I’m a member of your comrade game?
 If that’s the case, you're…
 a hopeless fool!
 Stop wasting time!
 Give me all you’ve got,
 you number one hyperactive, knucklehead Ninja!
 When I recalled the parts one by one,
 I felt as though I had understood everything
 Faded words which I kept so close to me
 Speechless nights, a hint of warmth,
 and this distant yearning for you
 I live, simply repeating this cycle
 Held in my two hands A droplet of time
 Softly clutching forgotten memories Lost words

 it seems Sasuke’s in the darkness right now.
